definition: awe-inspiring/abbr. for 赫茲|赫兹[he4 zi1], hertz (Hz)
Helmand (name)/Helmand province of south Afghanistan, capital Lashkar Gah

sentences.english: Bolan is also one of the richest poppy-growing areas in Helmand province.
sentences.chinese: 此外，柏蘭也是赫爾曼德省最富有的罌粟種植區之一。

sentences.english: My grandfather Herman worked in the Wheeling Steel plant.
sentences.chinese: 我的祖父赫爾曼在一個鋼鐵廠工作。

sentences.english: The attack happened in Gereshk in the southern province of Helmand.
sentences.chinese: 這起攻擊發生在阿富汗南部赫爾曼德省的傑裏什克。

sentences.english: They were all passengers in a minivan travelling in Helmand province.
sentences.chinese: 他們都是赫爾曼得省一輛小型貨車的乘客。

sentences.english: One of Herman's favorite stories was about how he met his wife Roma.
sentences.chinese: 赫爾曼最愛講的故事之一是他和妻子羅瑪的相遇。

sentences.english: But, Herman, how on earth could you possibly know that?
sentences.chinese: 但是，赫爾曼，你怎麼可能會知道這個？

sentences.english: The bank has apologised to Mr Herr-mann, who is no longer on the supervisory board.
sentences.chinese: 該行已向目前已從監事會離任的赫爾曼致歉。

sentences.english: The gap between Herman and the raft was widening.
sentences.chinese: 赫爾曼與救生筏的距離越來越大了。

sentences.english: Since its introduction, Eames Lounge Chair has been in continuous production by Herman Miller in America.
sentences.chinese: 自推出以來，主席赫爾曼米勒在美國已連續生產。

sentences.english: Most of the opium now comes from the Helmand province in the south.
sentences.chinese: 現在大部分的罌粟產自南部的赫爾曼德省。

definition: Lai Shengchuan (1954-), US-Taiwanese dramatist and director
Jobs (name)/see also 史提夫·賈伯斯|史提夫·贾伯斯[Shi3 ti2 fu1 · Jia3 bo2 si1], Steve Jobs
Brave New World, novel by Aldous Huxley 阿道司·赫胥黎[A1 dao4 si1 · He4 xu1 li2]
Jean Auguste Dominique Ingres (1780-1867), French Neoclassical painter
variant of 獨角戲|独角戏[du2 jiao3 xi4]
surname Adorno/Theodor Ludwig Wiesengrund Adorno 狄奧多·阿多諾|狄奥多·阿多诺[Di2 ao4 duo1 · A1 duo1 nuo4] (1903-1969), German sociologist, philosopher, musicologist, and composer
Handel (name)/George Frideric Handel (1685-1759), German-born Baroque composer, naturalized British in 1727
